title: The Void
desc:
Post 256
- You are Blinded for 5 turns
- Blinded:
You cannot see your cards, and the host shuffles your hand when you gain this effect.
When you attempt to play a card that you are unable to play, the host tells you that you may not play that card and asks for another card.
The host can in no way tell or hint as to what kind of card you had just attempted to play, simply stating that the card is unable to be played at the time.
